bibl.title: The Pursuit of Papyrological Fleas.
bibl.note: Delivered as a public lecture at the University of Warsaw on 22 March 1984. -The problems of editing texts illustrated by some passages requiring correction among papyrus documents: P. Indiana Univ. sans No. d'Inv. (= S.B. VI, 9094), 8; - P. Hamb. I, 30, 18-19; - P. Wisc. I, 30, ii, 9; 18-19; iii, 1; - P. Bon. I, 30 recto, 3-7; - O. Leid. Inv. F 99/1.323 (= S.B. X, 10311) = O. Leid. 266; - O. Tait Ashm. 68; - B.G.U. XI, 2116, 20-22. - Edition of P. Bon. I, 30 verso. Fragmentary receipt. Tebtynis, reign of Claudius.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Bon. I, 30 verso 145.4 O. Leid. 266 O. Tait Ashm. 68 P. Bon. I, 30 recto P. Hamb. I, 30 P. Indiana Univ. sans No. d'Inv. P. Wisc. I, 30 145.4 / 145.5 B.G.U. XI, 2116
BROWNE Gerald M., The Pursuit of Papyrological Fleas.

Delivered as a public lecture at the University of Warsaw on 22 March 1984. -The problems of editing texts illustrated by some passages requiring correction among papyrus documents: P. Indiana Univ. sans No. d'Inv. (= S.B. VI, 9094), 8; - P. Hamb. I, 30, 18-19; - P. Wisc. I, 30, ii, 9; 18-19; iii, 1; - P. Bon. I, 30 recto, 3-7; - O. Leid. Inv. F 99/1.323 (= S.B. X, 10311) = O. Leid. 266; - O. Tait Ashm. 68; - B.G.U. XI, 2116, 20-22. - Edition of P. Bon. I, 30 verso. Fragmentary receipt. Tebtynis, reign of Claudius.
